definition: A narrative structure that outlines the events and actions of a story, typically used in literature, film, or theater to depict the sequence of events and their development. It serves as a framework for organizing and presenting the storyline, including the introduction, rising action, climax, falling action, and resolution.

examples.german: Der Plot des Films war sehr spannend.
examples.english: The plot of the movie was very exciting.

examples.german: Ich habe den Plot des Buches nicht verstanden.
examples.english: I didn't understand the plot of the book.

examples.german: Der Plot der Serie entwickelt sich langsam.
examples.english: The plot of the series is developing slowly.

examples.german: Der Plot des Spiels ist sehr komplex.
examples.english: The plot of the game is very complex.

examples.german: Der Plot des Theaterstücks hat mich überrascht.
examples.english: The plot of the play surprised me.
